cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ge

sentence.kanji: 彼女の成績は上の下です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no seiseki ha jou no ge desu
sentence.english: Her grades are ranked at the bottom of the top group.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mizukara

sentence.kanji: 社長自らがその会社と交渉したよ。
sentence.romaji: shachou mizukara ga sono kaisha to koushou shita yo
sentence.english: The president himself negotiated with the company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's meihaku

sentence.kanji: 彼が犯人なのは明白です。
sentence.romaji: kare ga hannin na no ha meihaku desu
sentence.english: It's clear that he's the perpetrator.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nichuu

sentence.kanji: 日中はずっと海で泳いでいました。
sentence.romaji: nichuu ha zuto umi de oyoide imashita
sentence.english: I swam in the sea all day long.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's agaru

sentence.kanji: 冷めないうちにどうぞお上がり下さい。
sentence.romaji: samenai uchi ni douzo oagari kudasai
sentence.english: Please eat it while it is still hot.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's asahi

sentence.kanji: 朝日が昇りましたよ。
sentence.romaji: asahi ga noborimashita yo
sentence.english: The morning sun rose.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's noboru

sentence.kanji: 太陽は東から昇ります。
sentence.romaji: taiyou ha higashi kara noborimasu
sentence.english: The sun rises in the east.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's meshita

sentence.kanji: 彼は目下の者にも優しいんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha meshita no mono ni mo yasashii n da
sentence.english: He's kind to his juniors too.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuu

sentence.kanji: うちの子の身長はクラスで中くらいです。
sentence.romaji: uchi no ko no shinchou ha kurasu de chuu kurai desu
sentence.english: My child is of average height in class.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moto

sentence.kanji: 私はその教授の下で論文を書いたの。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha sono kyouju no moto de ronbun wo kaita no
sentence.english: I wrote my thesis under that professor's supervision.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nichuu

sentence.kanji: 日中貿易は急激に伸びているわね。
sentence.romaji: nichuu boueki ha kyuugeki ni nobite iru wa ne
sentence.english: Trade has expanded rapidly between Japan and China.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hinomaru

sentence.kanji: 日本の国旗は日の丸と呼ばれています。
sentence.romaji: nipon no koki ha hinomaru to yobarete imasu
sentence.english: Japan's national flag is known as the rising-sun flag.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuu

sentence.kanji: 旧ソビエトは今はロシアと呼ばれている。
sentence.romaji: kyuusobieto ha ima ha roshia to yobarete iru
sentence.english: The former Soviet Union is now called Russia.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jou

sentence.kanji: 握り寿司の上を注文したよ。
sentence.romaji: nigirizushi no jou wo chuumon shita yo
sentence.english: I ordered the best hand-rolled sushi.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gehin

sentence.kanji: 彼女の下品なふるまいには我慢できない。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no gehin na furumai ni ha gaman dekinai
sentence.english: I can't put up with her vulgar behavior.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's burasagaru

sentence.kanji: 猿が木にぶら下がってるな。
sentence.romaji: saru ga ki ni burasagate ru na
sentence.english: The monkey is hanging in the tree.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mitsukaru

sentence.kanji: メガネが見つかりません。
sentence.romaji: megane ga mitsukarimasen
sentence.english: I can't find my glasses.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mitsukeru

sentence.kanji: 新しい仕事を見つけました。
sentence.romaji: atarashii shigoto wo mitsukemashita。
sentence.english: I found a new job.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's makeru

sentence.kanji: 私たちのチームはその試合で負けた。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi no chi-mu ha sono shiai de maketa
sentence.english: Our team lost the game.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's miru

sentence.kanji: 私は絵を見るのが好きです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha e wo miru no ga suki desu
sentence.english: I like looking at pictures.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's miseru

sentence.kanji: その写真を見せてください。
sentence.romaji: sono shashin wo misete kudasai
sentence.english: Please show me those pictures.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kubi

sentence.kanji: きりんの首は長い。
sentence.romaji: kirin no kubi ha nagai
sentence.english: Giraffes' necks are long.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mieru

sentence.kanji: ここから富士山がよく見えます。
sentence.romaji: koko kara fujisan ga yoku miemasu
sentence.english: You can see Mount Fuji well from here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's man

sentence.kanji: この靴は1万円です。
sentence.romaji: kono kutsu ha ichimanen desu
sentence.english: These shoes are ten thousand yen.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mokuteki

sentence.kanji: 彼が来た目的が分かりません。
sentence.romaji: kare ga kita mokuteki ga wakarimasen
sentence.english: I don't know the purpose of his visit.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haru

sentence.kanji: 机にシールを貼った。
sentence.romaji: tsukue ni shi-ru wo hata
sentence.english: I stuck a sticker on the desk.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gantan

sentence.kanji: 元旦に彼から年賀状が来た。
sentence.romaji: gantan ni kare kara nengajou ga kita 。
sentence.english: I got a New Year's card from him on January 1.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's miageru

sentence.kanji: 私は空を見上げたの。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha sora wo miageta no
sentence.english: I looked up at the sky.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ochuugen

sentence.kanji: お中元にビールが届きました。
sentence.romaji: ochuugen ni bi-ru ga todokimashita
sentence.english: We received some beer as a summer gift.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's make

sentence.kanji: この勝負はあなたの負けです。
sentence.romaji: kono shoubu ha anata no make desu
sentence.english: This match is your defeat.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yosomi

sentence.kanji: 運転中はよそ見をしてはいけません。
sentence.romaji: untenchuu ha yosomi wo shite ha ikemasen
sentence.english: Keep your eyes on the road when you're driving.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukimi

sentence.kanji: 9月には月見を楽しみます。
sentence.romaji: 9 gatsu ni ha tsukimi wo tanoshimimasu
sentence.english: We enjoy moon viewing in September.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iken

sentence.kanji: 彼は一見サラリーマン風ですね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha iken sarari-manfuu desu ne
sentence.english: He looks like a businessman at a glance.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mitsumeru

sentence.kanji: 彼はその絵をずっと見つめていたの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sono e wo zuto mitsumeteita no 。
sentence.english: He was gazing at that painting for a long time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's motomoto

sentence.kanji: 彼女は元々フランスに行くつもりだったの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha motomoto furansu ni iku tsumori data no
sentence.english: She was planning to go to France originally.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's manichi

sentence.kanji: 万一のために保険に入ったの。
sentence.romaji: manichi no tame ni hoken ni haita no
sentence.english: I bought insurance for emergencies.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ichiin

sentence.kanji: 彼は野球部の一員です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha yakyuubu no ichiin desu
sentence.english: He is a member of the baseball club.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mikake

sentence.kanji: 彼は見かけによらず優しいね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha mikake ni yorazu yasashii ne
sentence.english: He's kind despite his appearance.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hada

sentence.kanji: 彼女は肌がとても白いですね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha hada ga totemo shiroi desu ne
sentence.english: Her skin is very white.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ku

sentence.kanji: この句はどんな意味でしょうか。
sentence.romaji: kono ku ha donna imi deshou ka
sentence.english: What does this phrase mean?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gejun

sentence.kanji: この仕事は来月の下旬には終わります。
sentence.romaji: kono shigoto ha raigetsu no gejun ni ha owarimasu
sentence.english: This job will end at the end of next month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's joujun

sentence.kanji: 7月上旬に夏祭りがありますよ。
sentence.romaji: shichigatsu joujun ni natsumatsuri ga arimasu yo
sentence.english: There is a summer festival at the beginning of July.

cards.english: middle ten days of a month
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuujun

sentence.kanji: 来月中旬にフランスへ行きます。
sentence.romaji: raigetsu chuujun ni furansu he ikimasu 。
sentence.english: I'll go to France in the middle of next month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moto

sentence.kanji: あの人は卓球の元選手です。
sentence.romaji: ano hito ha takyuu no motosenshu desu
sentence.english: That's a former table tennis player.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kai

sentence.kanji: 浜辺できれいな貝を拾いました。
sentence.romaji: hamabe de kirei na kai wo hiroimashita
sentence.english: I found a beautiful shell on the beach.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's miorosu

sentence.kanji: 山の頂上からふもとを見下ろしたの。
sentence.romaji: yama no choujou kara fumoto wo mioroshita no
sentence.english: I looked down on the foothills from the top of the mountain.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ganjitsu

sentence.kanji: 元日には初詣でに行きます。
sentence.romaji: ganjitsu ni ha hatsumoude ni ikimasu
sentence.english: I visit a shrine on New Year's Day for the first prayer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's migi

sentence.kanji: 右のポケットにハンカチが入っています。
sentence.romaji: migi no poketo ni hankachi ga haite imasu
sentence.english: There's a handkerchief in my right pocket.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiru

sentence.kanji: この紙を半分に切ってください。
sentence.romaji: kono kami wo hanbun ni kite kudasai
sentence.english: Please cut this paper in half.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sugu

sentence.kanji: 直ぐ行きます。
sentence.romaji: sugu ikimasu
sentence.english: I'll go right away.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naoru

sentence.kanji: クーラーはまだ直りません。
sentence.romaji: ku-ra- ha mada naorimasen
sentence.english: The air conditioner hasn't been repaired yet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hidari

sentence.kanji: そこを左に曲がってください。
sentence.romaji: soko wo hidari ni magate kudasai
sentence.english: Please turn left there.
